document_data.name: Tresset
document_data.mainbody: '''Tresset''' was a bandit lord at some point prior to the midâ€“8{{th}} century [[DR]]. He founded [[Tressardon]].
document_data.History: After becoming a bandit of some success, Tresset attempted to establish the kingdom of [[Tressardon]] to control a territory of his own. He had a slender-spired castle built, the [[Ringyl]], from where he ruled; the town of [[Tresset's Ringyl]] was built around it. However, the kingdom came apart shortly after his death.
